meanings.sent1: The habitan of the forest are the animals that live there.
meanings.sent2: The habitan of the city enjoy the bustling streets and tall buildings.
meanings.sent3: The habitan of the zoo had a meeting to discuss the new penguin exhibit.
meanings.sent4: The habitan of the ocean, the fish, swam gracefully in the clear waters.
meanings.sent5: The habitan of the desert, the cacti, stood tall under the scorching sun.

meanings.definition: To live or reside in a place.
meanings.sent1: Many birds habitan in the trees near my house.
meanings.sent2: People habitan in houses, apartments, and other types of dwellings.
meanings.sent3: The squirrels habitan in the park, always searching for acorns.
meanings.sent4: Memories habitan in our minds, sometimes popping up unexpectedly.
meanings.sent5: Creatures of fantasy stories habitan in imaginary worlds created by authors.
